vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συμπορεύομαι,
come, go, or proceed together, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἡ ψυχὴ -ευθεῖσα θεῷ [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τῷ Χρόνῳ [Refs 5th c.AD+]; ἐπί τινι συμφέροντι for some advantage, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II assemble, of the Senate, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; of a workers' guild, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]: metaphorically, consort together, hold intercourse, ἀλλήλοις [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to go with, come together
to go with, accompany, Lk. 7:11; 14:25; 24:15; to come together, assemble, Mk. 10:1*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ir o caminar con ; congregarse, juntarse alrededor, reunirse con (MAR.10:1)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 同行
2) 聚集, 群聚 (可 10:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 同行
2) 聚集, 群聚 (可 10:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đi với; đi theo. σύν (G4862) + πορεύω (G4198)
